::Zardus/Prowl/DeathStorm/Shredder::

Zardus nods a barely detectable nod at Nemesis' comment. He looks at the new 
bots and lowers his gun. If it came to a fight, he and Nemesis were severly 
outnumbered.

"This is earth, friend. Earth in it's prehistoric times. The alliance is 
simply ... the superior faction on this planet. While lacking troops, we are 
the best warriors. We're here to ensure the destruction of the other bots..." 
Zardus pauses, hoping that this information was enough.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Prowl grins to himself, noting how Iron Raptor began to babble like Liono. He 
looks at her.

"I suggest you don't give false encouragement. It can really get a bot down 
in the future. In truth, we fought like crap." He sigs and turns to Teltoli. 
"Follow me, I'll show you the CR chambers."

Prowl walks off down a hallway.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DeathStorm falls backwards with a surprised look on his face. Taking the 
opportunity, Shredder jumps up and runs off into the forest, going through 
bushes and dodging trees at full speed.

"Slag!" DeathStorm mutters under his breath and runs off after Shredder.
